encode

public static byte[] encode(int[] cp,
                            int length)

encode

public static byte[] encode(int[] cp)
Converts an array of Unicode scalar values (code points) into UTF-8. This algorithm works under the assumption that all surrogate pairs have already been converted into scalar code point values within the argument. get detail on this page. http://developers.sun.com/dev/gadc/technicalpublications/articles/utf8.html

Parameters:
cp - an array of Unicode scalar values (code points)
Returns:
a byte[] containing the UTF-8 encoded characters
